alert.note: Alert for Northern Middlesex; Northern New London; Southern Middlesex; Southern New Haven; Southern New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern New London, Middlesex and east central New Haven Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 445 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Durham, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Middletown, Wallingford, Guilford, Clinton, East Hampton, Old Saybrook, Durham, Chester, East Lyme, North Branford, Portland, East Haddam, Haddam, Old Lyme and Westbrook. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Middlesex; Northern New London; Southern Middlesex; Southern New Haven; Southern New London
